SEARCH
Package lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.Managers

Class EnvironmentManager

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.Managers.EnvironmentManager
public class EnvironmentManager extends Object

EnvironmentManager

The EnvironmentManager class is responsible for managing the game environment, including lighting effects. It provides methods to set up and control the lighting in the game.

  • Method Details

    • setUpLighting

      public void setUpLighting()

      setUpLighting

      Sets up the lighting effect in the game environment. This method creates a new instance of the Lighting class and initializes it with the specified parameters.
      See Also:
      • Lighting

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D graphics2D)

      draw

      Draws the lighting effect on the specified Graphics2D object.
      Parameters:
      graphics2D - the Graphics2D object on which to draw the lighting effect
